up a new building.

1180.81.text:
The rail actually goes
right through the building.

1182.31.text:
So they're out of the elements
when they load and unload.

Our goal is to see that
same opportunity happen

1189.25.text:
for these other communities
along the line too.

1192.66.text:
Especially where we have

but if you look at
those other communities,

you're talking about Delhi,

that's the structure
of line there.

little bit of Yellow Medicine
